login: select userId,account_accountNumber from user where userId = ? and userPassword= ? ;
getName: select bank.user.userName from bank.user where userId = ?
addBal: update bank.account set bank.account.accountBalance = bank.account.accountBalance + ? where bank.account.accountNumber = ?
reduceBal: update bank.account set bank.account.accountBalance = bank.account.accountBalance - ? where bank.account.accountNumber = ?
recieve: select * from bank.payment_log where account_accountNumber = ? and bank.payment_log.recieverAccountId = ?
